designSpec.placement: Center of the chest, approximately 3 inches (7.6cm) below the base of the collar.
designSpec.size: Approximately 3 inches (7.6cm) in width. This equates to roughly 15% of the visible hoodie width.
designSpec.colorContrast: Excellent. The neon cyan will provide a strong, vibrant contrast against the muted grey/blue color of the hoodie, ensuring the logo stands out prominently.
designSpec.notes: Given the texture of the hoodie, ensure the print method allows for a smooth application that prevents distortion of the logo. The 'MH5' text should be clean and crisp for maximum impact. Consider using a slightly thicker stroke on the font to enhance legibility. The Frost secondary color (#9DFBFF) is too close to the primary color to be effective on this background, so its usage should be avoided in this case. A single application of the primary color will yield the best results.
alternativePlacements: Sleeve placement: Upper left sleeve, centered between shoulder seam and cuff.
Hood placement: Centered on the back of the hood, smaller size.

Before final production, create a digital mockup to verify the logo size and placement are visually balanced.

No secondary color is recommended for this placement.
